rows.label: qst300204_msg0003
rows.name: Lastly, Zuo and I are your opponents!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0004
rows.name:
This is the final push to
make sure no one complains
about you being the leader.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0005
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Watching you fight has got
my blood pumping, too.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0006
rows.name:
Now, come at us! We're stronger
than when you first met us!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0007
rows.name: A serious match with no holding back!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0101
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]A complete defeat... As expected
of the one the old man chose.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0121
rows.name:
You're worried about us...[ML:Dash ] I felt
that even while we were fighting.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0122
rows.name:
To only drain our stamina so we
wouldn't get seriously injured...[ML:Dash ]
That takes great concentration.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0123
rows.name:
It felt like I was sparring
with Vandham-san himself.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0141
rows.name:
We need to get stronger
so we don't lose to you!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0151
rows.name:
Well, it seems everyone is starting
to accept you as the leader.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0152
rows.name:
After all, everyone feels at
ease when a strong person is
leading the Merc Group.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0153
rows.name:
At this rate, we'll catch up to
the Hr√¶svelgr Merc Group from
when the old man was around!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0154
rows.name:
And we'll keep taking on
missions and aim even higher!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0155
rows.name:
Come back in a while. We'll have
powered up the Merc Group even more!
